  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_287</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_287</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Traslación y dilatación de funciones</string>
            <string language="en">Translation and dilation of functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung und Ausdehnung von Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traduction et dilatation des fonctions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tradução e dilation das funções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Traduzione e dilatazione delle funzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάφραση και διαστολή των λειτουργιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los efectos sobre la gráfica de una función real de una variable real de una traslación o una dilatación. También se analiza el caso de traslaciones oblicuas o cambios en el origen de coordenadas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the effects of translations and dilations of a real-valued function of a real variable. The case of oblique translations and changes of the origin of coordinates are also studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">traslación</string>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coordenadas</string>
            <string language="en">coordinates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dilatación</string>
            <string language="en">dilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Effekte von Übersetzungen und von Ausdehnungen 
einer Realwertfunktion einer realen Variable zu studieren. Der 
Fall schiefer Übersetzungen und die Änderungen des Ursprung von 
Koordinaten werden auch studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier les effets des traductions et des dilatations 
d'une fonction à valeurs réelles d'une vraie variable. Le cas 
des traductions obliques et des changements d'origine des coordonnées
sont également étudiés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
os efeitos das traduções e dos dilations de uma função real-valued
de uma variável real. O exemplo de traduções oblique e as 
mudanças da origem das coordenadas são estudados também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare gli effetti delle traduzioni e delle dilatazioni di una 
funzione real-valued di una variabile reale. Il caso delle 
traduzioni oblique ed i cambiamenti dell'origine delle coordinate 
egualmente sono studiati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει τα αποτελέσματα των μεταφράσεων και τις διαστολές
μιας real-valued λειτουργίας μιας πραγματικής μεταβλητής. 
Η περίπτωση των πλάγιων μεταφράσεων και οι αλλαγές 
προέλευσης των συντεταγμένων μελετώνται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Koordinaten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traduction</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
